mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update dish
name = #{name},
category_id = #{categoryId},
price = #{price},
image = #{image},
description = #{description},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from dish where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%');
